title: No More Yesterdays
description: It was a devastating loss……and she needed her friends more than ever.Would it be enough?Emily’s life was thrown into a tailspin when her fiancé cheated on her. If she hadn’t let her friend drag her to the concert, she might not have met Jack. Could he be the one to help her put her life back together?The spark between her and Jack……is undeniable.But heat alone isn’t enough.Jack wants two things. A life with Emily and knowing she’s safe, but can they both happen? A twenty-month tour isn’t easy. It has him worried.Is his stalker a threat?Can Jack and Emily’s relationship survive?You’ll love this next chapter in the lives of Emily and Jack, because this isn’t a bad boy rock star story, it’s a romance for the ages.Get it now.This book contains graphic language and sexual situations.
author: Jessica Marlowe
